attributes.action: A people's vote of no confidence in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Please refer to the percentage majority of the EU vote versus the overall referendum turn out. This is not representative of the population of the U.K. and safeguards for a lawful majority should have been instilled in the passing of the referendum by Parliament.
attributes.background: The referendum result was not a reflection of the majority view of the population of the U.K. nor does the government now have a mandate to represent the people.
